wikipedia_page.main: Richard Henry Coleman (3 April 1888 – 17 February 1965) was a cathedral organist, who served at Peterborough Cathedral.

response: Since 2019 the organist and director of music has been John Robinson. Previous organists have included Richard Henry Coleman, Charles Hylton Stewart, Herman Brearley, Thomas Lucas Duerden, John Bertalot, David Anthony Cooper, Gordon Stewart and Richard Tanner.

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
response: *1908–1912 Richard Henry Coleman (later organist of Peterborough Cathedral)
